document.full_text: the u.s. chemical safety board said tesoro corp had not adequately maintained a heat exchanger at its anacortes, washington, refinery, that exploded on april 2, 2010, causing the death of seven workers.
document.title: u.s. board sees inadequate maintenance in tesoro blast
lines_and_colors: the u.s. chemical safety board said tesoro corp had not adequately maintained a heat exchanger at its anacortes, washington, refinery, that exploded on april 2, 2010, causing the death of seven workers.
